name: Watermelon! - FREE
description:
Using only slices of watermelon, you must defeat the robots who are attacking earth.
"Watermelon!" as a weapon?
"Watermelon!" as a weapon?
Yes, it's incredibly normal but super powerful. Eat watermelons and throw their peels at the robots, to make them slip up, up and up until they reach the moon. Avoid bullets and get bonus points along the way. Is it war or a game? You will find out the answer after you tried it!

------------------------------

The #15 Free Game in ISRAEL.

Watermelon! is probably one of the most bizarre games I've played on my iPod Touch to date, and it's also one of the most amusing. -Technobrains

------------------------------

How to play:
Tilt to move left or right, stroke the screen to shoot.

------------------------------

FREE VERSION FEATURES:
One level of light-hearted robot attacking! Check out the full version of Watermelon! for the complete survival mode, high scores, multiple robot types and more!
